testcase.name: New Todo › should allow me to add todo items
New Todo › should clear text input field when an item is added
New Todo › should append new items to the bottom of the list
Mark all as completed › should allow me to mark all items as completed
Mark all as completed › should allow me to clear the complete state of all items
Mark all as completed › complete all checkbox should update state when items are completed / cleared
Item › should allow me to mark items as complete
Item › should allow me to un-mark items as complete
Item › should allow me to edit an item

failure.message: demo-todo-app.spec.ts:174:7 should allow me to edit an item

testcase.failure:
[chromium] › demo-todo-app.spec.ts:174:7 › Item › should allow me to edit an item ────────────────
Test timeout of 30000ms exceeded.
Error: locator.fill: Test timeout of 30000ms exceeded. Call log: - waiting for getByTestId('todo-item').nth(1).getByRole('textbox', { name: 'E3dit' })
179 | await secondTodo.dblclick(); 180 | await expect(secondTodo.getByRole('textbox', { name: 'Edit' })).toHaveValue(TODO_ITEMS[1]); > 181 | await secondTodo.getByRole('textbox', { name: 'E3dit' }).fill('buy some sausages'); | ^ 182 | await secondTodo.getByRole('textbox', { name: 'Edit' }).press('Enter'); 183 | 184 | // Explicitly assert the new text value.
at /Users/sbharadwaj/Documents/OpenSource/playwright-syntest/tests/demo-todo-app.spec.ts:181:62
attachment #1: screenshot (image/png) ────────────────────────────────────────────────────────── test-results/demo-todo-app-Item-should-allow-me-to-edit-an-item-chromium/test-failed-1.png ────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
attachment #2: video (video/webm) ────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────── test-results/demo-todo-app-Item-should-allow-me-to-edit-an-item-chromium/video.webm ────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────

testcase.name: Editing › should hide other controls when editing
Editing › should save edits on blur
Editing › should trim entered text
Editing › should remove the item if an empty text string was entered
Editing › should cancel edits on escape
Counter › should display the current number of todo items
Clear completed button › should display the correct text
Clear completed button › should remove completed items when clicked
Clear completed button › should be hidden when there are no items that are completed
Persistence › should persist its data
Routing › should allow me to display active items
Routing › should respect the back button
Routing › should allow me to display completed items
Routing › should allow me to display all items
Routing › should highlight the currently applied filter
has title
get started link
New Todo › should allow me to add todo items
New Todo › should clear text input field when an item is added
New Todo › should append new items to the bottom of the list
Mark all as completed › should allow me to mark all items as completed

failure.message: demo-todo-app.spec.ts:82:7 should allow me to mark all items as completed

testcase.name: Editing › should hide other controls when editing
Editing › should save edits on blur
Editing › should trim entered text
Editing › should remove the item if an empty text string was entered
Editing › should cancel edits on escape
Counter › should display the current number of todo items
Clear completed button › should display the correct text
Clear completed button › should remove completed items when clicked
Clear completed button › should be hidden when there are no items that are completed
Persistence › should persist its data
Routing › should allow me to display active items
Routing › should respect the back button
Routing › should allow me to display completed items
Routing › should allow me to display all items
Routing › should highlight the currently applied filter
has title
get started link
New Todo › should allow me to add todo items
New Todo › should clear text input field when an item is added
New Todo › should append new items to the bottom of the list
Mark all as completed › should allow me to mark all items as completed
Mark all as completed › should allow me to clear the complete state of all items
Mark all as completed › complete all checkbox should update state when items are completed / cleared
Item › should allow me to mark items as complete
Item › should allow me to un-mark items as complete
Item › should allow me to edit an item
